actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for hospitals to allow the biological father to attend the birth of his child if the woman consents.

summary.text: Directs all hospitals which receive Federal grants, loans, or loan guarantees to allow the biological father to attend the birth of his child if the woman consents.

titles.title: A bill to provide for hospitals to allow the biological father to attend the birth of his child if the woman consents.
